forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 40. North wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
The sun graces Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, casting a warm but gentle glow over the cityscape. Skies are clear, revealing the magnificent contours of the Golden Gate and the bustling hive of the downtown area, all bathed in serene light. The temperature hangs in the mid-fifties, a comfortable invitation to venture outside, while a light wind brushes past, emphasizing the crispness of the day. With clear visibility stretching over the bay, one can almost feel the city breathe, free from fog’s usual embrace.

As twilight approaches, expect the charm of a clear night, with temperatures settling around a cool forty degrees. It would be advisable to layer up, perhaps with a stylish jacket or a cozy sweater, as the north wind stirs. These conditions promise an evening perfect for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or a quiet visit to one of the city's beloved cafes, where the warm ambiance complements the cool, refreshing air. Engage with the city in its more tranquil moments—perhaps the hum of evening conversations will replace the daytime clamor, crafting a gentle tapestry of urban life.
